Name: ❂ Hexaluga ❂ Dungeons and Hunting ☠
About the game: The events of the game carry us to one of the islands of the universe of ❂ Hexaluga ❂ / which has recently been invaded by lots of monsters. None of the hunters is able to fight them all and bring peace to the lands. They need a leader that can gather a party of heroic fighters to hunt these creatures in dungeons. Are you ready to become that hero, win honor in battles, and earn gold? Main features: * Discover a combination of RPG and clicker in one game; * Gather a party of randomly generated fighters; * Fight monsters in dungeons; * Use fighters' skills in battles; * Let your fighters use their skills automatically and just watch the battle, * Or help them fight by choosing the right skill.
